project.title: Il Progetto
project.subtitle: Hello and welcome to
paragraphs: My name is Liam Menneci. I am a young drummer and content creator from Italy.

I have created Drummers to Watch to shine a spotlight on fellow talented young drummers from all corners of the world. This project serves as a platform for young musicians to inspire and uplift others in their own musical journey.

Through interviews, collaborations, and drumming showcases, D2W celebrates these drummers' exceptional abilities, from mesmerizing beats to jaw-dropping solos and their commitment to storytelling through the universal language of music.
Join me as we celebrate the raw talent, dedication, and creativity of young drummers around the world.
D2W is a partner project of Drumming Connects Us
